content:
I think I'll focus on adding more complexity to the engine compartment and interior. I've been thinking about adding more details like wiring, hoses, and maybe even some engine components like cylinders or pistons. I've also been considering adding more details to the interior, like textured seats or a more detailed dashboard.

As for new techniques, I did learn about a new way to create realistic paint chipping using a combination of masking tape and paint. One of the guys at the meetup showed me how to use the tape to create sharp, defined edges and then paint over it to create a chipped, worn look. I'm excited to try it out on my Ferrari model.

Speaking of which, I should mention that I started building this model about three weeks ago, on a Sunday afternoon. It was a rainy day, and I spent around 5 hours working on it, getting the basic chassis and engine block assembled. Since then, I've worked on it sporadically, usually for about an
